name: Ethyl
descriptions: Ethyl is a glowing one test subject, held in the Chop Shop's containment area in Underworld in Fallout 3.
Ethyl is one of two glowing one test subjects Doctor Barrows keeps at the ghoul clinic, the other being Meat. Both are former residents of Underworld,

The G.E.C.K. contains a non-feral ghoul version of her, which was used for a screenshot for the Wasteland Census section of the Fallout 3 game guide, GOTY edition. This version is a member of the Underworld faction and is listed in the "Underworld residents" list. Ethyl, along with Meat, remains in the game files of Fallout: New Vegas.
